item.title: Loadstone network help plz pi
item.dc:creator: @k1ng0frs k1ng0frs
item.description:
@k1ng0frs wrote:

kill boy 98:

So in this code addHDHoverButton(26223, "Lodestones/Unlock", 11, 40, 40, "Edgeville", 250, 26224, 5); addHDHoveredButton(26224, "Lodestones/UnlockHover", 11, 50, 50, 26225); [\code] so whith one will be the action id ill relese a full tut of it when i added it to my sever and give u credit for helping

the ActionButtonId should print out when you opened the Lodestone interface and click on a Icon

Read full topic

item.title: Loadstone network help plz pi
item.dc:creator: @k1ng0frs k1ng0frs
item.description:
@k1ng0frs wrote:

kill boy 98:

ok but how would i have it so when i click the icon for varrock it teleport me there

That would work in the same class, when you click the icon for varrock it should print out the ActionbuttonId Ex.

case ACTIONID: c.getPA().startTeleport(1, 1, 0, "modern"); break;

Read full topic
